aboutPage.title: Who We Are
aboutPage.subtitle: With a modest beginning in the UAE, Knights Engineering has transformed into a dynamic and fast-growing company, providing complete end-to-end solutions from conceptual design to commissioning.
aboutPage.text: Our commitment to delivering projects on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards is demonstrated by our track record and motivated team. We foster a culture of safety, quality, and innovation in all our operations.
aboutPage.missionText: To deliver high-quality, cost-effective projects safely and on schedule, while fostering long-term relationships with our clients.
aboutPage.visionText: To be the partner of choice for comprehensive engineering and construction solutions in the region and beyond.
aboutPage.valuesText: Integrity, Safety, Quality, and Innovation. These principles guide every decision we make and every action we take.

contactPage.infoText: We're open for any suggestion or just to have a chat. Feel free to reach out to us during our office hours.
